Class BrickRenderer

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.ui.BrickRenderer
public class BrickRenderer extends Object
BrickRenderer - Handles all brick rendering on the game board. Single Responsibility: Render bricks with proper colors and positioning. Responsibilities: - Create and manage brick rectangles - Apply correct colors based on brick type - Render bricks on game board and preview panes - Handle brick visibility and updates

    BrickRenderer.ColorProvider
    Inner class for color management - separates color logic from rendering.
